scripts.deploy-function: AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=foobar AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=foobar SLS_DEBUG=* serverless deploy function -f hello
scripts.invoke: AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=foobar AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=foobar SLS_DEBUG=* serverless invoke -f hello -l
scripts.logs: AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=foobar AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=foobar SLS_DEBUG=* serverless logs -f hello -t
